commands:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 
        Schedule (
            `index` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
            title VARCHAR(255),
            who VARCHAR(255),
            entry_type VARCHAR(255),
            dctv_channel VARCHAR(255),
            start_date DATETIME,
            end_date DATETIME,
            includes VARCHAR(255),
            description TEXT,
            location VARCHAR(255),
            link VARCHAR(255),
            updated_at DATETIME,
            bookmarked INTEGER 
        );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 
        Speakers (
            `index` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
            who VARCHAR(255),
            title VARCHAR(255),
            media VARCHAR(255),
            bio TEXT,
            last_updated DATETIME 
        );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 
        Vendors (
            `index` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            title VARCHAR(255),
            description TEXT,
            link VARCHAR(255),
            partner INTEGER 
        );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 
                    Speakers (
                        `indexsp` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
                        who VARCHAR(255),
                        sptitle VARCHAR(255),
                        media VARCHAR(255),
                        bio TEXT,
                        last_update DATETIME
                    );
